p: Hyperglycemia induced oxidative stress via mitochondrial electron-transport chain and subsequent activation of the inflammatory response are considered to be major contributor to diabetes related disorders ( Santilli et al., 2015). Therefore, phenolic compounds such as phenolic acids and flavonoids, as antioxidants, have a beneficial role in preventing and improving vascular diabetic complications ( Aryaeian et al., 2017) and enhance diabetic wound healing process (Thent and Latiff, 2017). Phytochemicals with antioxidant activity were also proven to revert atherosclerotic cardiovascular complications such as coronary artery diseases by reducing the elevated serum lipid levels in diabetic patients ( Bacanli et al., 2019; Hirano, 2018).
